column1: The Pit Room////I had the pork ribs and was able to swap the two sides for an order of chips and queso. The queso was addictive
column2: just the right amount of spice. The chips were fresh made and went great with the salsa.  The rib portion was huge!  There is a nice serving bar with pickles and all sorts of hot sauces to try
column3: many with stern warnings on them. The bread was quite stale
column4: which was the only sad part of the meal. Happy to have good bbq in town.
